scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names backend,frontend "npm run backend" "npm run frontend"
scripts.frontend: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run dev
scripts.frontend:build: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run build
scripts.frontend:lint: npm --prefix frontend install && npm --prefix frontend run lint
scripts.cap:sync: npm run frontend:build && npx cap sync
scripts.cap:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open ios
scripts.cap:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap open android
scripts.cap:run:ios: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run ios
scripts.cap:run:android: npm run cap:sync && npx cap run android
